name: Helmholtz Kernel Information Profile
description: The Helmholtz Kernel Information Profile (KIP) defines the most basic metadata a FAIR DO should have.

properties.name: Profile
properties.description: This field uses a PID to refer to the profile that is used to describe the digital object. Multiple profiles can be used. At least this profile must be used.

properties.name: digitalObjectType
properties.description: Describes the type of the object that is references by such a record.

properties.name: digitalObjectLocation
properties.description: A url as location. As a workaround, a PID in proxy notation (resolvers url) can be used instead if needed.

properties.name: etag
properties.description: A string that is used to detect changes to the digital object when using optimistic concurrency control.

properties.name: dateCreated
properties.description: Date/time of object creation.

properties.name: dateModified
properties.description: Date/time of a modification of the object.

properties.name: version
properties.description: If tracked, a version for the object, which must follow a total order. Mandatory for all objects with at least one predecessor version.

properties.name: contact
properties.description: A web-resolvable pointer to an institution or a person responsible for the digital object.

properties.name: license
properties.description: names license requirement of the collection (type : string, currently, but could be also given as a controlled vocabulary, like '["CC0", "CC-BY", "CC-BY-SA", "CC-by-NC", "CC-BY-ND", "CC-BY-NC-SA", "CC-BY-NC-ND"]', context : collection).

properties.name: topic
properties.description: One or more topics the digital object is related to.

properties.name: hasMetadata
properties.description: One or more PID(s) referring to related FAIR DOs providing metadata for the digital object.

properties.name: isMetadataFor
properties.description: One or more PID(s) referring to related FAIR DOs for which the digital object provides metadata.

properties.name: wasGeneratedBy
properties.description: A PID pointing to an activity which generated a object.

properties.name: wasDerivedFrom
properties.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the object from which the current object was derived.

properties.name: specializationOf
properties.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the object from which the current object was derived.

properties.name: wasRevisionOf
properties.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the object from which the current object was derived.

properties.name: hadPrimarySource
properties.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the primary source of a object.

properties.name: wasQuotedFrom
properties.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the object from which the current object was derived.

properties.name: alternateOf
properties.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the object from which the current object was derived.

properties.name: provenanceGraph
properties.description: A PID pointing to another FAIR DO which refers to the provenance graph of a object.
